clients.title: Make Use of the Q&A Section on Your GMB
description: Do not leave questions unanswered in the Q&A section of your Google My Business listing. Consumers who ask questions expect immediate responses. Those who read the Q&A section of your listing expect their commonly asked questions to be answered. Answers should be thoughtful and direct. This will also provide accurate information about your business and your services. More importantly, if you do not provide the answer, then someone else will!
